planet.name: OGLE-2012-BLG-0026L b
OGLE 2012-BLG-026L b
planet.description: This multi-planetary system was discovered during a high-magnification gravitational microlensing event. Both planets are located beyond the snow-line, an important clue for planet formation models. Adaptive optics imaging was used to detect the flux from the host star.

planet.name: OGLE-2012-BLG-0026L c
OGLE 2012-BLG-026L c
planet.description: This multi-planetary system was discovered during a high-magnification gravitational microlensing event. Both planets are located beyond the snow-line, an important clue for planet formation models. Adaptive optics imaging was used to detect the flux from the host star.
